title: League of Legends Launcher won't open
body:
I can't get league of legends to start, when it tries to start up I'll see the league of legends logo but the launcher never appears. I've restarted my computer, I've tried opening it as an administrator. There is no duplicate LoL processes going on in the background... What should I do? Should I uninstall it completely and reinstall it or is there a fix that Riot can do on their side?

I'm also using Windows if that helps... League of Legends was working fine last night.

replies.body:
I have the same problem and after trying every suggestion I've found over the past 3 hours nothing has worked, i noticed today many avast users have had this problem, my Launcher was detected as malware but was no where to be found in the chest, i made it an exception, i added and removed it from the chest, i tried what was suggested here, I've restarted my PC 3 times, i changed antiviruses and still nothing... Whatever avast did, it's permanent and despite everyone being able to fix this, i can't seem to :(

I guess i will need to reinstall league but that could take days for me.
Decided to just go all the way and reinstall, took a while to delete everything but finally got it working, nice big fresh start.

first, try this: 
____
Game Won't Start After I Hit the .exe / Play button

1. Try running as an admin by right clicking on the executable and selecting "Run As" and "Administrator", or by using the lol.admin.launcher.exe

2a. Delete everything inside the your RADS downloads folder (Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\downloads) AND
2b. Delete everything inside your RADS solutions folder ( Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions)
2c. Restart your computer and repatch
_____
if this doesn't work, check your anti virus.  this morning my Avast decided it was going to block LoL.  restored and added to exceptions list and now its working

Thanks! I actually already deleted everything and uninstalled it because I got impatient. The launcher is here now and I added LoL to exceptions list with Avast before and it didn't seem to change anythng. I also tried running it as administrator previously as well
